# SURGE NeuroTech Club

<!-- :::

::: -->

<br>

Welcome to the NeuroTech Club website! We are a community of neuro-enthusiasts dedicated to exploring, understanding, and innovating in the field of neurotechnology. Join us as we delve into this exciting frontier!

The club runs weekly, **Thursdays 3-5 pm** in the SURGE room ([Life Sciences Building, Oceanography wing Room O2660](about_us.qmd#directions))

If you're new to the club and don't know where to begin, you can click on [*Get Started*](docs/get-started/index.qmd) or, just ask one of the SURGE folks!

<br>

## Contact:

For general inquiries, email us at: [bciclub@dal.ca](mailto:bciclub@dal.ca)

For specific neurotech questions, please reach out to our programming specialists: [Brynn](mailto:brynn.hs@dal.ca) or [Max](mailto:mascini.max@dal.ca)
